@description.body:

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The JSONP data store is a specialization of {@link qx.data.store.Json}. It differs in the type of transport used ({@link qx.io.request.Jsonp}). In order to fulfill requirements of the JSONP service, the method {@link #setCallbackParam} can be used. Please note that the upgrade notices described in {@link qx.data.store.Json} also apply to this class.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: url {String?} URL of the JSONP service.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
delegate {Object?null} The delegate containing one of the methods
   specified in {@link qx.data.store.IStoreDelegate}.
@param.description:
The delegate containing one of the methods
   specified in {@link qx.data.store.IStoreDelegate}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
callbackParam {String?} The name of the callback param. See
   {@link qx.bom.request.Jsonp#setCallbackParam} for more details.
@param.description:
The name of the callback param. See
   {@link qx.bom.request.Jsonp#setCallbackParam} for more details.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The name of the callback parameter of the service. See {@link qx.bom.request.Jsonp#setCallbackParam} for more details.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The name of the callback function. See {@link qx.bom.request.Jsonp#setCallbackName} for more details. Note: Ignored when legacy transport is used.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
